name: MSG91
natural_language_description: 这是 MSG91 节点。主要用于: Sends transactional SMS via MSG91

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: sms

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: send

from.name: from
from.description: The number from which to send the message
from.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sender ID | 作用: The number from which to send the message | (必填项)

to.name: to
to.description: The number, with coutry code, to which to send the message
to.natural_language_description: 参数名: To | 作用: The number, with coutry code, to which to send the message | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: The message to send | (必填项)
